channel.title: ArimexRSPS 667
channel.description:
[SIZE=3][IMG]http://www.rune-server.org/static/avatar/admin.gif[/img] Introduction[/SIZE]
[QUOTE][CENTER][SIZE=3]Hello and welcome to ArimexRSPS advertisement thread We are built in 667 loading 718 base. I´m currently developing it alone but we are planning to get extra as soon as the budget lets us. The server have been on developement for 1 month while 3 weeks of it was open beta, even tho we hit 15 players & 200 client downloads in the beta phase. the server was closed for 2 weeks because i broke my wrist really badly and wasnt able to do nothing since i was in hospital recoverying from surgery. But now we are back ALIVE and im still doing daily updates so all suggestions are welcome![/SIZE][/CENTER][/QUOTE]
[SIZE=3][IMG]http://www.rune-server.org/static/avatar/admin.gif[/img] Links[/SIZE]
[QUOTE][CENTER][SIZE=3]Forums - http://arimex.net76.net/forum.php Client - http://www.upload.ee/files/4588479/Arimex_Launcher.jar.html Website - [URL=http://"Google.com"]Coming Soon[/URL][/SIZE][/CENTER][/QUOTE]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qg9CZlM.png[/img] [/CENTER]
[B][SIZE=3][CENTER]Ge buy/sell almost all items Many Bosses including lots of wilderness bosses Daily Updates Great Combat System No Pay-To-Win Decent Xp Rates for skills (pretty fast for combat ones) Active Staffteam Fresh Economy Gambling All Skills working 3 seconds character saving, prevents rollbacks Drygore weaponry Rare Drop System Xp Counter All Special attacks working Custom Ganodermic Minigame 5 different prestige shops (1-50 levels)[/CENTER]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LTMfkft.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AiEdrr8.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cOjmAYr.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KUQt9pQ.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/yjg3eJw.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mA77ZjW.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1JkXiEa.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TS6zCPL.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Ux495e0.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1bMwL8f.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rfSEUrf.png[/img]
Credits to Hiken - For awesome Features & Media logo Poanizer - for awesome starting source[/CENTER]

item.title: ArimexRSPS 667
item.dc:creator: @Rs_Gert Rs Gert
item.description:
@Rs_Gert wrote:

[SIZE=3] Introduction[/SIZE]

[QUOTE][CENTER][SIZE=3]Hello and welcome to ArimexRSPS advertisement thread
We are built in 667 loading 718 base. I´m currently developing it alone but we are planning to get extra as soon as the
budget lets us. The server have been on developement for 1 month while 3 weeks of it was open beta, even tho we hit 15 players & 200 client downloads in the beta phase. the server was closed for 2 weeks because i broke my wrist really badly and wasnt able to do nothing since i was in hospital recoverying from surgery. But now we are back ALIVE and im still doing daily updates so all suggestions are welcome![/SIZE][/CENTER][/QUOTE]

[SIZE=3] Links[/SIZE]

[QUOTE][CENTER][SIZE=3]Forums - http://arimex.net76.net/forum.php
Client - http://www.upload.ee/files/4588479/Arimex_Launcher.jar.html
Website - [URL=http://“Google.com”]Coming Soon[/URL][/SIZE][/CENTER][/QUOTE]

[CENTER]
[/CENTER]

[B][SIZE=3][CENTER]Ge buy/sell almost all items
Many Bosses including lots of wilderness bosses
Daily Updates
Great Combat System
No Pay-To-Win
Decent Xp Rates for skills (pretty fast for combat ones)
Active Staffteam
Fresh Economy
Gambling
All Skills working
3 seconds character saving, prevents rollbacks
Drygore weaponry
Rare Drop System
Xp Counter
All Special attacks working
Custom Ganodermic Minigame
5 different prestige shops (1-50 levels)[/CENTER]
